source('~/Documents/overdispersion/readresults.R')
results$mu.lower <- round(results$mu.lower,1)
results$mu.upper <- round(results$mu.upper,1)
results$chisq <- round(results$chisq,2)
results$gamma <- round(results$gamma,2)
results$bootstrap <- round(results$bootstrap,2)
results$vgam <- round(results$vgam,2)
results$ee <- round(results$ee,2)

# where phi==1, population is Poisson
results[which(results$phi==1),"Population"] <- "Poisson"
